IX.i.3.D.1.a
.
Authority Under Which UMEs Are Deductible
The authority for allowing unreimbursed medical expenses (UMEs) under
current-law pension is
38 CFR 3.272(g)
, and
Parents’ Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC) and Section 306 Pension is
38 CFR 3.262(l)
.
Note
:  UMEs can be used to reduce countable income for current-law pension, Section 306 Pension, and Parents’ DIC purposes.
